== Kannadiparamba (CT) (627234) ==

Kannadiparamba (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 8.93 sq. km. and harbouring 2791 households with total population of 13677 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 528 km. Male population is 6056 and female population is 7621. Scheduled Caste population is 1439 and Scheduled Tribes population is 37. Census Location Code of the town is 627234<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 65 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 102 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 12 km.
